Instructions:
1. Open SWB > Digital Customer Tab.
2. Search by WEB-SO or SO#.
3. Check 'Leg 1' box for internal tracking numbers.
4. Check 'Digital Attributes' for vendor-specific updates.
1. Digital Customer Tab > Click order line item.\n2. View OMT Action Notes (e.g., 'Awaiting Price Release').\n3. DO NOT expedite; releases are handled by OMT/Credit teams.
Rationale: Determining the exact hold reason for blocked orders.

Instructions:
1. ETQ > eRequests > New Document.
2. Warehouse Requests > Sure Ship Domestic.
3. WHSE Code: V72. Host: AC Prod.
4. Note: Enter 'Released to Warehouse' status details.
Rationale: Expedite Reno orders stuck for >2 days.

Instructions: 1. ETQ > eRequests > Receiving Expedite - Draft.\n2. Mandatory: Supplier PO, Carrier, Tracking, Delivery Date.\n3. DHL 'Signed By': If unknown, enter 'N/A'.
Rationale: For Reno items delivered but not received for >3 days.

Instructions: 1. Open SF Case: 'Expedite Receiving [PO] / SO[NUM]'.\n2. Email: URGENTRECEIVING.HK@arrowasia.com.\n3. Data needed: PO, SO, Tracking, Carrier, Arrival Date, MPN, Qty.
Rationale: Expedite CDH hub orders delivered but not received for >3 days.

Instructions: 1. Open SF Case.\n2. Sure Ship: ecommerce.dlc.emea@arrow.com / Helpdeskvenlo.dlc.emea@arrow.com.\n3. Receiving: business.support.pdc.emea@arrow.com.
1. Email: verical-logistics@verical.com.\n2. CC: amunoz@arrow.com, jawells@arrow.com.\n3. Template: 'Hello Team, please provide MFG CoC for WEB-SO: [SO], PO: [PO], Delivery ID: [ID]'.
Rationale: Specific contact workflow for Nogales V90 hub.

Instructions: 1. MyConnect > Report a Digital Issue.\n2. Must provide: URL/Link, Screenshot, WEB-SO, and User Email.
Rationale: For errors on Arrow.com or Verical.com websites.

Instructions: 1. MyConnect > Warehouse IT Support - WMS.\n2. Scope: Packlist errors, SWB printer errors, and label reprinting.
Rationale: For technical errors in warehouse management systems.

Instructions: 1. Open SF Case.\n2. Provide: Correct vs Incorrect price screenshot, WEB-SO, and MPN.\n3. For PayPal overcharges: Open 'Digital Ops' ticket.
Rationale: Correcting billing errors or PayPal issues.

Instructions:
1. Review AP report for unpaid orders.
2. Create new SO: Match original details, set Resale to $0.00, remove Freight.
3. Manual Header Hold: 'Replacement SO; reaching out to [SUPPLIER]'.
4. Email AP: 'Please confirm receipt of replacement Dropship Order D[NUM] to pay [SUPPLIER] for Invoice [INV]'.
Rationale: Used when AP cannot pay original SO to 3rd party suppliers.

Instructions: 1. Waldom: Kelly Anderson (Kellys@waldom.com).\n2. Air Electro: Lauren Buckley (LBuckley@airelectro.com).\n3. PEI Genesis: Use Teams Group daily from 10/16 - 10/21.
Rationale: Primary contacts for 3rd party dropship coordination.

Instructions: 1. Reno [VXX] Packing List: wms-prod.arrow.com/PAWMSReprints/\n2. Non-Military CoC: arrow.tfaforms.net/4865283\n3. Military Parts (V37, VM5, etc.): arrowcrm.my.salesforce-sites.com/arrowservices
